title: What is the result of % in Python? - Stack Overflow
content: On Python 2 1 / 4 gives 0, as the result is rounded down. The integer division can be done on Python 3 too, with // operator, thus to get the 7 as a result, you can execute: 3 + 2 + 1 - 5 + 4 % 2 - 1 // 4 + 6 Also, you can get the Python style division on Python 2, by just adding the line. from __future__ import division
